title: Retraction notice to: “A multifunctional V-Shape bis-hydrazone: Characterization, Supramolecular architechtures, AIEE, recognition of cations (Cu2+, Zn2+) and anions (HPO42- and CN-), mechanochromism, computational and cell imaging studies.” [Sensors and Actuators B: Chemical Volume 275, 1 December 2018, Pages 116-126]
